issue.title: [C++][Python] Update developers/python.rst (console blocks + "" in archery install)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15623](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15623). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The _developers/python.rst_ page has to be __ updated with:
 \* use 'console' highlighting (instead of 'shell'). See: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11840>
 \* add "" to 'pip install -e arrow/dev/archery[lint]'

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15623?focusedCommentId=17511784) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12485
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12485>
